data.message: Wow I forgot all about dog tags. I kept mine for a few yrs. Lost them moving around but they were very special to me. Wish I had them. Thanks.

replies.message: Thanks for sharing your story and for your service, Rodolfo. -Tenaya
lost mine also but every so often a ad comes on yopu can order them dont remember what it was

Look for them! Make inquiries!  There is someone (?) in the US who finds dog tags & tries to return to rightful owners.  Just start a campaign and ask everyone from ur congressman to local newspaper.  Don't give up; they are part of who u are now!  Good luck Rodolfo Morales and Thomas Zanghi!
I got my dog tags still so tell Trump to go ahead and push the button!
Same here - list in a move 😢
God bless. Thank you for your service and scaifice.

Terry Senter Noooo, no pushing the button. My grandson and his fiancé are in the US Army, he already served a year in Afghanistan and has orders to serve in Korea come a February, he will miss his first child being born😪
You can replace all medals dog tags and anything you were given or earned! Write to the military hall of records, google it they’ll give an addy! We replaced my husbands things that we lost in moves
God bless our brave young men who defend not only our country but countries overseas in need of help.❤️🙏🇺🇸

Facebook -Help-
My Account was fraudulently used to post a car for sale in Wesley Chapel, FL Pontiac Sunfire 1998 $450
Facebook my attempts to contact through Messenger are not answered
Happy Veterans Day to all you guys thanks for your service and I hope all y'all find y'all dog tags good luck
Hey Marquis. If you think someone has logged into your account without your permission, we recommend that you secure it right away. Learn how: http://bit.ly/2ieUJo3. -Elizabeth
